attributes.action: Intervene in the debacle of qualified firefighters having to needlessly re-apply for 'Continuous Proffesional Development Pay, when they have already had to pass strenuous exams to qualify for it in the first place.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Qualified Fire fighters who have completed 15 years service, passed qualifying examinations and who have maintained their competentcies receive a payment for long service at present, to become CBT payments in future. Each current recipient will now be required to fill in badly worded and difficult forms to re-apply for pay that they already receive. These forms must then be assessed and verified by third parties, costing considerable sums of money in administration, It could be understood if this was required of new recipients but to require existing recipients to do so cannot be a good example of best practice or common sense.
